TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许开发人员仅重写 区域中 或服务器控件的选定部分的呈现。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of or server controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个帧的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素是指 web 部件 chrome控件或服务器控件中包含区域。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control or server control contained in a zone. 控件的 chrome 包括其边框、 标题栏、 图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单的标题栏中显示。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观设置区域级别和适用于该区域中的所有服务器控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone. Web 部件控件集使用类，以呈现为 chrome控件。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，此类提供了开发人员能够自定义 （如页眉或页脚中） 的任何单个部分的呈现方式中的控件而无需处理这些控件的所有呈现的区域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the controls in a zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls. 例如，您可以重写方法以自定义一些特定的样式属性应用于区域，但您可以依赖默认的呈现处理其余部分。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest. 类包含一些重要方法，当你想要重写的呈现时非常有用控件。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 一个是方法，使你能够更改的样式特性与关联的对象对象用于呈现的控件。One is the method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the object associated with the object used to render a control. 另一个是构造函数，当您重写时，使用方法在自定义类，以创建您的自定义的一个实例对象。Another is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一个有用的方法是方法，可用于控制区域 （而不是 chrome 元素，如页眉、 页脚和标题栏） 中的控件的内容区域的呈现。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 方法使您能够从呈现中排除某些谓词，如果出于某种原因您不希望用户看到 UI 中的这些谓词。The method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI. 最后，如果想要完全以编程方式控制呈现的所有方面控件，可以重写方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. 多个属性类也非常有用。Several properties of the class are also useful. 并属性提供对与关联的区域的引用对象和当前实例，分别。The and properties provide references to the zone associated with the object and the current instance, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类重写的默认呈现中的控件区域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in a zone. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载在示例中的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 包含自定义的源代码的类区域和一个类。A class that contains the source code for a custom zone and a class. - 该示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 若要运行此代码示例，对于需要获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例中的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 请注意，没有`Register`指令要注册已编译的组件和标记前缀的文件的顶部附近。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另请注意页面引用使用的元素的自定义区域``和包含该区域中多个标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Also note that the page references the custom zone using the element `` and includes several standard ASP.NET server controls within the zone. 服务器控件不会实现任何实际的功能;它们用于此处仅演示了如何将类功能应用于呈现的区域。The server controls do not implement any actual functionality; they are used here only to illustrate how the class features apply to rendering zones. 请注意，这些服务器控件，但它们不是实际控件，每个自动换行 （由 ASP.NET) 使用的是对象在运行时，因此具有相同的功能控件。Note that these server controls, though they are not actual controls, are each automatically wrapped (by ASP.NET) with a object at run time, so they will have the same functionality as controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/webpartchromecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/webpartchromevb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是自定义源区域和一个类。The third part of the code example is the source for the custom zone and a class. 在自定义区域类的构造函数，则代码将检查`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`属性。In the constructor for the custom zone class, the code checks the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property. 如果值为`true`，谓词菜单中的每个呈现区域中的控件。If the value is `true`, verbs are rendered in a menu for each of the controls in the zone. 这是正常的默认行为中 Web 部件控件集。This is the normal, default behavior in the Web Parts controls set. 如果`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`属性值是`false`，即此自定义区域中的默认值，为每个控件的标题栏中的链接单独呈现谓词。If the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property value is `false`, which is the default in this custom zone, the verbs are rendered individually as links in the title bar of each control. 请注意，在网页上的代码在何处``元素声明，则`RenderVerbsInMenu`属性设置为`true`，因此，谓词将显示在控件上的菜单中。Notice that in the Web page code where the `` element is declared, there is a `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute set to `true`, so that the verbs will appear in menus on the controls. 若要体验此功能，您可以设置的声明性`RenderVerbsInMenu`属性为`false`，并记下谓词为链接的呈现方式。To experiment with this feature, you can set the declarative `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute to `false`, and note how the verbs are rendered as links. 自定义类重写上几种方法，呈现和自定义区域创建的实例`MyWebPartChrome`类在其方法。The custom class overrides the rendering on several methods, and the custom zone creates an instance of the `MyWebPartChrome` class in its method. 这适用于页的自定义呈现。This applies the custom rendering to the page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)] 当加载网页的浏览器中时，您可以看到各种样式和其他呈现自定义项的源代码中的所做`MyWebPartChrome`类显示在在区域中呈现的控件。When you load the Web page in a browser, you can see how the various stylistic and other rendering customizations made in the source code of the `MyWebPartChrome` class appear on the controls rendered in the zone.

span.para: 继承自类时您想要覆盖的某些部分的默认呈现或服务器控件。您可以选择重写方法，方法，特别是或方法，以便自定义呈现。若要使用您的自定义类的控件在区域中，开发自定义区域派生自类，并重写其方法。详细了解如何使用子对象在某个区域中，请参阅示例部分。

Inherit from the class when you want to override the default rendering of certain sections of or server controls. You can optionally override the method, the method, and especially the or methods, to customize the rendering. To use your custom class for the controls in a zone, develop a custom zone derived from the class, and override its method. For details on how to use a child object in a zone, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase zone, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager manager) cil managed
Public Sub New (zone As WebPartZoneBase, manager As WebPartManager)

span.span: The associated control.
The control on the current page.
Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的新实例初始化类。The initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要由区域在其方法创建的实例处理 chrome 呈现和任何自定义呈现的对象区域中的控件。It is used primarily by a zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了两件事情。The following code example demonstrates two things. 首先，它创建自定义类的新实例`MyWebPartChrome`通过重写方法在派生名为区域`MyZone`。First, it creates a new instance of the custom class `MyWebPartChrome` by overriding the method in a derived zone called `MyZone`. 第二个的构造函数中`MyWebPartChrome`类，它可以在类中使用的私有字段到分配的构造函数参数中的对象。Second, in the constructor of the `MyWebPartChrome` class, it assigns the objects in the parameters of the constructor to private fields that can be used within the class. 此示例中从而为您提供方法来访问关联的区域和对象构造函数中，即使在之前和属性进行访问。This example thus gives you a way to access the associated zone and object even in the constructor, before the and properties are accessible. 最后，请注意，若要运行的构造函数，为基构造函数必须也调用方法声明的一部分。Finally, note that for the constructor to work, the base constructor must also be invoked as part of the method declaration. 下面的代码包含两个自定义类。The following code contains the two custom classes. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，包括 Web 页面以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)]

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType) cil managed

abstract member CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style override this.CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

span.span: The control that is currently being rendered.

param.name: chromeType
param.span: 特定控件的 chrome 类型； 枚举值之一。

span.span: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 创建样式对象，该对象为 对象呈现的每个 控件提供样式特性。

span.span: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each control rendered by the object.

returns.span: 包含 的样式特性的 。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，它由对象以呈现控件。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render a control. 默认方法创建基于的样式特性属性值为控件中引用`webPart`参数。The default method creates style attributes based on the property value of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 一种特殊情况发生时控件处于选中状态。A special situation occurs when a control is selected. 如果该页中的页显示模式，其中可选择控件，并且实际上选择当前控件，默认值方法还可以合并中的样式信息的控件的样式信息属性。If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the property. ## Examples 此代码示例演示使用方法。This code example demonstrates use of the method. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下一节中的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 请注意，它首先检索由基方法，创建的样式信息，然后修改通过更改使用的字体的样式信息控制呈现。Notice that it first retrieves the style information created by the base method, and then modifies the style information by changing the font used for the control being rendered. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#5)] 如果加载网页的浏览器中，您可以看到中使用的字体控件是在重写指定方法。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the font used in the controls is the one specified in the overridden method.

span.span: is .
is not one of the enumeration values.

span.para: 如果继承自类，可选择替代方法，以及你想要添加的样式信息与基方法使用自定义的样式属性。有关演示，请参阅示例部分中的代码。

If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add. For a demonstration, see the code in the Example section.

The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 基于开发人员提供的条件，从呈现中排除特定谓词。

span.span: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.

returns.span: 包含与 关联的所有谓词的 。

span.span: A containing all verbs associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够自动筛选与关联的谓词的集合中的某些谓词控件，并防止呈现已筛选的谓词。The method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.

span.span: The collection is .
- or -
is .

span.para: 如果创建自定义类，可选择替代方法来筛选出特定呈现的谓词。若要执行此操作的最常见方法是创建签入的谓词的私有方法的集合控件，并确定是否每个谓词应呈现为，根据你选择的条件。请注意，基方法提供了大量很难重现如果完全重写方法; 的默认筛选条件如果只有少数特殊情况下，你可能想要首先，调用基方法，然后将生成的集合传递通过你自己的其他方法来应用自定义筛选条件。

If you create a custom class, you can optionally override the method to filter out specific verbs from being rendered. The most common way to do this is to create a private method that checks the verbs in the collection of a control and determines whether each verb should be rendered, based on criteria that you choose. Note that the base method provides a lot of default filtering criteria that would be difficult to reproduce if you completely override the method; if you only have a few special cases, you might want to call the base method first, and then pass the resulting collection through your own additional method to apply your custom filtering criteria.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartChromeClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取网页中呈现的 对象的客户端 ID。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the object as rendered in a Web page.

returns.span: 一个包含 对象的客户端 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取包含的表的客户端 ID`webPart`呈现。The method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered. 表是直接对应于呈现的输出对象，并使用作为容器来应用样式并创建模块化布局控件。The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control. 可用于获取的客户端 ID对象的客户端编写脚本的目的，如果你想要更改的镶边中的某些内容而无需将此页回发到服务器。It is useful to get the client ID of the object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartTitleClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取表单元格的客户端 ID，该表单元格包含 控件的标题。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a control.

returns.span: 一个包含 标题的客户端 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索包含标题的表单元格的客户端 ID 值`webPart`呈现。The method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered. 在其中一个重要的方案方法用于获取客户端 ID 的标题单元格的`webPart`于 Web 部件拖放功能。An important scenario in which the method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature. 方法也是有用的其他客户端编写脚本的目的。The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes. 例如，无法更改的标题或具有客户端脚本，而不必将此页回发到服务器的单元格的样式。For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection GetWebPartVerbs(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 获取应使用 控件呈现的谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a control.

returns.span: 包含应使用 呈现的所有谓词的 。

span.span: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了开发人员有机会重写方法，并从呈现中排除特定谓词。The method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered. 它类似于方法，还可以排除呈现的谓词。This is similar to the method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered. 但是，方法不适合想要检查某些条件来决定是否呈现谓词的情况。However, the method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb. 相反，此方法很有用，当您事先知道您始终想要排除某个谓词。Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb. 例如，如果您开发一个自定义类，您可能会决定要始终在排除关闭谓词控件，使用户可以永远不会关闭的控件。For example, if you develop a custom class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on controls, so that users can never close the controls. 而不是设置属性设置为`false`可以在所有控件，您只需重写方法，并排除关闭任何上呈现谓词呈现与您的自定义控件对象。Rather than setting the property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any control rendered with your custom object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下一节中的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 重写的方法使用基方法来检索的所有动词`webPart`控件，然后循环访问添加除关闭动词与所有谓词的谓词集合对象。The overridden method uses the base method to retrieve all verbs from the `webPart` control, then iterates through the verb collection, adding all verbs except the close verb to an object. 这减少了谓词组然后分配给新，其返回给调用方。This reduced set of verbs is then assigned to a new , which is returned to the caller. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#4)] 如果加载 Web 页在浏览器中，单击每个谓词菜单 （显示在标题栏中的向下箭头）控件，可以看到关闭谓词不呈现任何控件。If you load the Web page in a browser and click the verbs menu (shown with a downward arrow in the title bar) of each control, you can see that the close verb is not rendered for any control.

span.span: is .

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderPartContents(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

abstract member RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

span.span: The that receives the webPart content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的主要内容区域，不包括页眉和页脚。

span.span: Renders the main content area of a control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以重写的正文区的呈现`webPart`，同时保持为默认呈现的页眉和页脚的呈现。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下一节中的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 重写的方法执行两项操作以自定义主体的呈现控件。The overridden method does two things to customize the rendering for the body of the control. 首先，它进行检查以确定是否当前选定，如果是，写出一个字符串，并不呈现内容。First, it checks to determine whether the control is currently selected, and if so, writes out a string and does not render the contents. 第二，如果未选中控件，并且如果该控件的区域的类型`MyZone`，该方法将呈现控件。Second, if the control is not selected, and if the control's zone is of type `MyZone`, the method renders the control. 可以使用此后一种检查，如果你想要确保自定义类可用于仅呈现中的特定类型的控件设计为包含的区域对象。This latter check could be used if you wanted to ensure that a custom class can be used only to render controls in a specific type of zone that is designed to contain the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果加载网页的浏览器中，可以看到每个控件的内容正常呈现。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the content of each control is rendered normally. 如果将页切换到设计模式 (通过选择**设计**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件) 并将其中一个控件拖入空白区域标记为**WebPartZone2**，将控件内容呈现方式不同，因为自定义对象不用于标准区域中的呈现。If you switch the page into design mode (by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control) and drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the contents of the control are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering in a standard zone. 这是相同的效果，如果您尝试使用自定义将实现类的任何其他区域除了`MyZone`类中，由于前面的源代码。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, due to the preceding source code.

span.para: 您可以选择重写方法。如果是，只需执行任何呈现自定义项所需，然后调用其方法。如果还想要依赖于发生连接错误时的默认呈现，首先，调用基方法，然后自定义从基方法返回。

You can optionally override the method. If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method. If you also want to rely on the default rendering in the event of connection errors, call the base method first, and then customize the that is returned from the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RenderWebPart (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderWebPart(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

abstract member RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

span.span: The that receives the webPart content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现完整的 控件及其所有部分。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现完整控件，与标头、 内容和页脚。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 重写此方法，开发人员可以完全呈现的所有方面进行编程控制`webPart`，因此，重写此方法是相当复杂。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex. 与中的某些其他方法一样开发人员可以重写，如果您重写此方法，一种常见和有用的方法是首先，调用基方法的类需要控件，则返回和自定义的某些属性，而不处理的完整呈现自己。As with some other methods in the class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对当前 实例的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the current instance.

value.span: 对网页上当前 的引用。

span.span: A reference to the current on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对当前的引用页上的实例。The property provides a reference to the current instance on the page. ## Examples 此代码示例演示使用属性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否当前所呈现的控件是所选的控件，这在本例中意味着页面在编辑视图中，并且当前正在编辑控件。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the current control being rendered is the selected control, which in this example means that the page is in edit view, and the control is currently being edited. 如果这些条件为 true，不呈现控件的正文，并在相应位置写入字符串。If these conditions are true, the body of the control is not rendered, and a string is written in its place. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果加载网页的浏览器中，您可以将页切换到编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击任何一个控件; 的谓词菜单中的编辑谓词呈现页时，则不会呈现用于编辑所选控件的正文。You can click the edit verb in the verbs menu of either of the controls; when the page is rendered, the body of the control selected for editing is not rendered. 但是，如果将控件拖入空白区域标记为**WebPartZone2**，呈现控件的正文。However, if you drag the control into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the body of the control is rendered. 这是因为第二个区域是一种标准区域，并且它不使用自定义类在此示例中要呈现控件。This is because the second zone is a standard zone, and it does not use the custom class in this example to render the controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As WebPartZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对关联的 区域的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the associated zone.

value.span: 对与 关联的 的引用。

span.span: A reference to a that is associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对引用区域，为其包含的控件对象提供呈现。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering. ## Examples 此代码示例演示使用属性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定该区域是否当前与关联对象是类型的区域中`MyZone`。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the zone currently associated with the object is a zone of type `MyZone`. 如果是这样，呈现控件的内容。If so, the control's contents are rendered. 此代码将使自定义使用除了旨在创建它的一个实例的任何其他区域中的对象。This code would prevent the custom object from working with any other zone besides the one designed to create an instance of it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果加载网页的浏览器中，每个控件的内容将正常呈现。If you load the Web page in a browser, the content of each control is rendered normally. 您可以通过选择页切换到设计模式**设计**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。You can switch the page into design mode by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 如果在拖动其中一个控件到标有空白区域**WebPartZone2**，其内容呈现方式不同，因为自定义对象不用于呈现。If you drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, its contents are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering. 这是相同的效果，如果您尝试使用自定义将实现类的任何其他区域除了`MyZone`类中，由于前面的源代码。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, because of the preceding source code.
